metadata.title: CVE-2022-31213 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in dbus-broker before 31. Multiple NULL pointerdereferences can be found when supplying a malformed XML config file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-31213` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dbus-broker - 31-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dbus-broker package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '31-1').
